details: +5 Influence from holding office: State Senator
+15 Influence from Hidden Funder: The People's Alliance

game_log: The Fundraiser has already used their first Fundraise action this term.
Balanced Bot takes the Fundraise action and gains 5 PC.

archetype.title: The Insider
archetype.description: Start with a State Senator office, but only 15 PC.

mandate.title: The Kingmaker's Pact
mandate.description: You must have supported at least two pieces of legislation sponsored by the player who wins the Presidency. Your support must have been on successful legislation.

favors.description: Look at the top card of the Event Deck and gain 5 PC.
Add 5 PC support to pending legislation.

archetype.title: The Orator
archetype.description: Once per Term, you may re-roll one failed legislation die roll.

mandate.title: The Grassroots Movement
mandate.description: Win the Presidency without ever having held a Governor office.

archetype.title: The Populist
archetype.description: When you gain PC from negative Public Mood as an Outsider, gain 1 additional PC.

mandate.title: The People's Alliance
mandate.description: Ensure the Public Mood is +2 or +3 when the final Presidential election occurs.

archetype.title: The Fundraiser
archetype.description: Your first Fundraise action each Term grants an additional 2 PC.

mandate.title: The Fiscal Watchdogs
mandate.description: Win the Presidency having committed 20 PC or less to the final election.

cards.title: Celebrity Politician
cards.description: The player with the lowest PC gains 15 PC.

cards.title: Midterm Fury
cards.description: Timing. Draw only in Round 2 or 3 of a Term. Public Mood moves 2 spaces towards 'Very Angry'.

cards.title: Natural Disaster
cards.description: Move Public Mood -1. A random Governor (or a random player if no Governors) must respond, losing 10 PC.

cards.title: Grassroots Movement
cards.description: The player with the fewest held offices (0 is fewest) gains 10 PC.

cards.title: Surprise Endorsement
cards.description: You (the player who drew this card) gain 10 PC.

cards.title: Stock Market Crash
cards.description: Move Public Mood -3 spaces. Any player who chose to 'Fundraise' this round loses 5 PC instead of gaining it.

cards.title: Technological Leap
cards.description: Move Public Mood +1. The player with the least PC gains 10 PC.

cards.title: War Breaks Out
cards.description: Public Mood is locked at its current position for the rest of the Term. All legislation requires 2 additional PC to pass until the Term ends.

cards.title: Foreign Policy Crisis
cards.description: A random player rolls a d6: 1-3: Lose 10 PC. 4-6: Gain 10 PC.

cards.title: Last Bill Was a Dud!
cards.description: The last player to successfully sponsor legislation loses 10 PC. Move Public Mood -1.

cards.title: Scandal!
cards.description: The player with the most PC loses 15 PC and must immediately draw one card from the Scrutiny Deck.

cards.title: Economic Boom
cards.description: Move Public Mood +2 spaces. All players gain 5 PC.

cards.title: Recession Hits
cards.description: Move Public Mood -2 spaces. All players lose 5 PC.

cards.title: Minor Donor Scandal
cards.description: You must return a questionable donation. Lose 8 PC.

cards.title: Old Vote Haunts You
cards.description: Your past policies are unpopular. Public Mood drops by 1.

cards.title: Minor Donor Scandal
cards.description: You must return a questionable donation. Lose 8 PC.

cards.title: Gaffe Investigation
cards.description: A past mistake surfaces. Pay 10 PC.

cards.title: Old Vote Haunts You
cards.description: Your past policies are unpopular. Public Mood drops by 1.

cards.title: Internal Campaign Strife
cards.description: Your team is in disarray. Lose 5 PC.

cards.title: Campaign Finance Audit
cards.description: Your Fundraise action grants 2 PC less next round.

cards.title: Negative Press Cycle
cards.description: You are bombarded by bad press. Lose 5 PC.

cards.title: Unpopular Stance
cards.description: Your position on a key issue backfires. Lose 7 PC.

cards.title: Gaffe Investigation
cards.description: A past mistake surfaces. Pay 10 PC.

cards.title: General Hank 'Bulldog' Jackson
cards.description: When you sponsor the Military Funding legislation, you automatically succeed (no roll needed).
cards.weakness_description: Any time the Public Mood would improve due to an Event Card, it improves by 1 less space.

cards.title: Judge Evelyn Reed (Retired)
cards.description: You are immune to the 'Gaffe on the Trail' and 'Scandal!' Event Cards.
cards.weakness_description: You cannot sponsor 'Change the Tax Code' legislation.

cards.title: Steve McRoberts, The Hedge Fund Bro
cards.description: When you take the Fundraise action, gain an additional 10 PC.
cards.weakness_description: If an Event Card forces a random player to lose PC, you must be the target if you are an eligible choice.

cards.title: Katja Petrova, The Master Pollster
cards.description: Once per Term (during Round 4), you may secretly look at one office's candidacy cost before anyone declares their candidacy.
cards.weakness_description: Opponents only need to tie, not beat, your roll to win a contested election against you.

cards.title: 'Big' Sal Marconi, The Union Boss
cards.description: Gain a +5 PC bonus when committing PC to an election for Governor or Congress.
cards.weakness_description: Before the Election Phase begins, you must pay 10% of your current PC (rounded up) or discard this Ally.

cards.title: Celeste Imani, The Grassroots Activist
cards.description: If your PC total is the lowest at the start of your turn, gain 5 PC.
cards.weakness_description: You gain 2 PC less from Fundraise actions.

cards.title: Marcus Thorne, The Savvy Spin Doctor
cards.description: The first time you would lose PC from the Public Mood track each round, ignore the loss.
cards.weakness_description: You have a -1 penalty to your dice roll when sponsoring 'Protect The Children!'.

cards.title: Diane Westbrook, The Veteran Campaign Manager
cards.description: Once per Election Phase, you may add a flat +1 to any single election roll (after rolling).

favor_supply.description: Choose one: discard two of your Political Favors, or reveal your Player Archetype to all players.
You've been handed a politically toxic dossier. Pass this card to another player. Whoever holds it when the next Upkeep Phase begins loses 5 Influence.

turn_log: The Fundraiser has already used their first Fundraise action this term.
Balanced Bot takes the Fundraise action and gains 5 PC.
